page.title: 08Hemsford Holiday Centre
page.content: Hemsford was a mixed live-stock farm until 4 years ago when it was converted to a holiday centre. There are 11 two-storey holiday cottages and 4 one-storey cottages. Hemsford has fishing amenities in its own pond. There is a coin operated laundry, a daily milk and paper delivery and shop for "topping-up" on essentials. Pets are not allowed at Hemsford. The cottages have a colour TV, two bedrooms, and lounge and a kitchen. Hemsford provides riding for the visitors and public. They have an outdoor school, they also take rides round the lanes for the complete beginner, novice and expert. There is also a heated indoor swimming pool, a sauna, solarium, gym, tennis court and 9-hole approach golf-course, and a play area for residents.
